S. No.DescriptionAuthority before which the application has been madeCurrent Status
1.Consolidated Consent and Authorization (CC&A)Gujarat Pollution Control BoardApplication for amendment of expansion of production capacity of yarn from 368 MT per month to 460 MT per month has been made by our Company.
* Our Company undertakes to file necessary application before relevant authorities to obtain all approvals, as applicable at relevant stage including but not limited to the aforesaid.
